title: Graphic Categories
description: Boolean tags for categorizing graphics and images

photo.description: True if the graphic is a photograph

diagram.description: True if the graphic contains diagrams or technical illustrations

flow_diagram.description: True if the graphic is a flow diagram with stages and links between them

contains_text.description: True if the graphic contains readable text

people.description: True if the graphic shows people or human figures

animals.description: True if the graphic shows animals

collage.description: True if the graphic is a collage or composite of multiple images

chart_or_graph.description: True if the graphic contains charts, graphs, or data visualizations

illustration.description: True if the graphic is a drawing, painting, or artistic illustration
